name: Sicko Sanctum
storyline: Despite Griffith's efforts to get to the bottom of the Monolith of Foolery and finally obtain forgiveness for the treacherous crimes they've comitted they have been expelled from life by Martation. Now Griffith is relegated to a codified hell, and you play their fight through it.
summary: Sicko Sanctum is a score-attack boomer shooter hybrid that owns character action merchandise. Snag upgrades and some skill, keep battlin' till you get a high score that makes you feel like you've had just a neat little time playing the game :)
